testcase.classname: I want to add process details for IPO which is having the fabric sheet
testcase.name: Verification of submitting the MU working for Shiffly process
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to Login page...........................................passed Then User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And navigate to New Fabric Sheet working screen.............................passed And Click on styles expansion...............................................passed And click on IPO in the styles expansion....................................passed And Verify that data is displaying in grids after selecting the IPO.........passed And Click on Edit icon in MU Working grid...................................passed And Verify the Fabric Required is displaying the value or not...............passed And Enter the value in Residual shrinkage...................................passed And select the process1 as Shiffly process..................................passed Then select the process2 as NA..............................................passed Then verify the qty in greige field whether value is displaying or not......passed And Enter the data in Shiffly process section fields........................passed Then Enter Fabric Budget details for greige process.........................passed And Enter Fabric Budget details for Shiffly process.........................passed And Click on submit button to save the mu working...........................passed
